edu.ucla.sspace.matrix

Class OnDiskMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.matrix.OnDiskMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Matrix
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SparseOnDiskMatrix

    public class OnDiskMatrix
extends Object
implements Matrix
    A Matrix implementation that uses a binary file to read and write Returns a copy of the specified rowvalues of the matrix. The matrix is stored in row-column order on disk, so in-order column accesses to elments in a row will perform much better than sequential row accesses to the same column.

    If a IOException is ever raised as a part of executing an the methods of an instance, the exception is rethrown as a IOError.

    Author:
    David Jurgens

      • getColumnVector

        public DoubleVector getColumnVector(int column)
        Returns the column as a vector. Whether updates to the vector are written through to the backing matrix is left open to the specific implementation. Implementations that maintain their data in a sparse format are encouraged to return a SparseVector instance.
        Specified by:
        getColumnVector in interface Matrix
        Parameters:
        column - The column to return a DoubleVector for.
        Returns:
        A DoubleVector representing the column at column.

      • getRow

        public double[] getRow(int row)
        Returns the entire row.
        Specified by:
        getRow in interface Matrix
        Parameters:
        row - The row to return an array for.
        Returns:
        A double array representing the row at row.

      • getRowVector

        public DoubleVector getRowVector(int row)
        Returns a DoubleVector for an entire row. Implementations should return an approriately typed DoubleVector. Whether updates to the vector are written through to the backing matrix is left open to the specific implementation. Implementations that maintain their data in a sparse format are encouraged to return a SparseVector instance.
        Specified by:
        getRowVector in interface Matrix
        Parameters:
        row - the index of the row to return.
        Returns:
        A DoubleVector representing the row at row.

        public double[][] toDenseArray()

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
        Upon finalize, deletes all of the backing files. This is most necessary when the JVM is long-running with many OnDiskMatrix instances that are not deleted until exit.
        Overrides:
        finalize in class Object
